1: -module(state_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: 
    5: -export([all/0, end_per_testcase/2, init_per_testcase/2]).
    6: 
    7: all() -> [ets_tests].
    8: 
    9: init_per_testcase(ets_tests, Config) ->
   10:     TabId = ets:new(account, [ordered_set, public]),
   11:     ets:insert(TabId, {andy, 2131}),
   12:     ets:insert(TabId, {david, 12}),
   13:     ets:insert(TabId, {steve, 12943752}),
   14:     [{table, TabId} | Config].
   15: 
   16: end_per_testcase(ets_tests, Config) ->
   17:     ets:delete(?config(table, Config)).
   18: 
   19: ets_tests(Config) ->
   20:     TabId = ?config(table, Config),
   21:     ct:pal("Show configs: ", [Config]),
   22:     [{david, 12}] = ets:lookup(TabId, david),
   23:     steve = ets:last(TabId),
   24:     true = ets:insert(TabId, {zachary, 99}),
   25:     zachary = ets:last(TabId).
